newsitem.title: POLAND: Polish refinery,ENI in cracking plant deal.
newsitem.headline: Polish refinery,ENI in cracking plant deal.

text.p: Poland's Rafineria Gdanska SA, said on Friday it had signed an $80 million deal with Italy's Snamprogetti SpA, a unit of Ente Nazionale Idrocarburi Spa (ENI), for the construction of a hydrocracking plant.
The refinery said in a statement on Friday that Snamprogetti will design the plant and deliver the installation necessary for the hydrocracking plant to be completed in 1999.
It said investment bank Merrill Lynch will arrange financing, which may include credits for part of the deal from the Italian firm.
The cracking plant is part of the Gdansk refinery's $425 million modernisation sheme aimed at increasing oil processing to 4.5 million tonnes per year from 2.8 million in 1996.
